mapper.select: SELECT mat_id as "matId", cli_id as "cliId", mat_cd as "matCd", mat_nm as "matNm", mat_unit as "matUnit", mat_price as "matPrice", mat_comm as "matComm", mat_reg_date as "matRegDate", mat_mod_date as "matModDate", mat_is_active as "matIsActive" FROM material

SELECT mat_id as "matId", cli_id as "cliId", mat_cd as "matCd", mat_nm as "matNm", mat_unit as "matUnit", TO_CHAR(mat_price, 'FM999,999,999') as "matPrice", mat_comm as "matComm", TO_CHAR(mat_reg_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "matRegDate", TO_CHAR(mat_mod_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "matModDate", mat_is_active as "matIsActive" FROM material
